def has_light(x: item):
    # Function to check if an item is a light in the bedroom
    symbol has_light= exists y: item : is_bedroom(y) and is_light(x) and inside(x, y)
    return has_light

def in_bedroom(light:item):
    # Function to check if a light is in the bedroom
    symbol in_bedroom=exists room: item : is_bedroom(room) and inside(light, room)
    return in_bedroom

behavior turn_on_light(light:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(light)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind light: item where:
            is_light(light) and in_bedroom(light) and has_light(light)
        # Select a light in the bedroom
        turn_on_light(light)
